meanings.definition: Farthest to the left in a group or series.
meanings.sent1: In the row of chairs, the leftmost seat was empty.
meanings.sent2: The leftmost book on the shelf fell off.
meanings.sent3: The leftmost cookie in the jar looked lonely.
meanings.sent4: Her leftmost thought was always about her family.
meanings.sent5: The leftmost tree in the forest stood tall and proud.
